entity.description: Release planning, versioning, deployment, and maintenance procedures for DOTS Family Mode including Nix packaging, systemd integration, and production deployment strategies

requirements.description: Use semantic versioning (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH), maintain version consistency across workspace crates, tag releases with git tags, update CHANGELOG.md with release notes, and coordinate version bumps across all crates
requirements.title: Version Management

entity.title: Release Management Framework
